ReferenceDocuments.description: What was the intended procedure regimen?

ReferenceDocuments.name: PRDOSRGM
ReferenceDocuments.description: Maps directly to the SDTMIG variable.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: The regimen information may further clarify the dose administration and dose frequency (e.g., TWO WEEKS ON, TWO WEEKS OFF). This may be pre-specified or collected. The sponsor may wish to create a codelist to collect this data consistently.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record the intended regimen for the procedure to be performed.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDISC Aligned NCI Standard Equivalent CDE
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is to be used for CDISC aligned data collection in place of CDE 2871669 from the original NCI Standard CRF Template.
